ch.ethz.dcg.jukefox.controller.player.playlistmanager
Interface IPlaylistManager

All Superinterfaces:
IReadOnlyPlaylistManager
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractPlayerController, CliPlayerController, PlaylistManager
public interface IPlaylistManager
extends IReadOnlyPlaylistManager

A playlist manager manages a playlist related. It acts as a wrapper of the playlist controller core: While the core changes whenever the play mode changes, the class implementing this interface stays the same.
